tweet: Only one thing registers on the subconscious mind: repetitive application - practice. What you practice is what you manifest.
If you desire love, try to realize that the only way to get Love is by giving love. That the more you give, the more you get.
To manifest your hearts desires you must BE what your heart desires. Joy Page
Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all of the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
